CHANT_ARIA_OF_DISSONANCE.name: aria of dissonance
CHANT_ARIA_OF_DISSONANCE.wearoff: The dissonance stops ringing in your ears.

CHANT_SHADOWS_SORROW_SONG.name: shadows sorrow song
CHANT_SHADOWS_SORROW_SONG.wearoff: The shadows in your mind clear up.

CHANT_SONATA_OF_MALAISE.name: sonata of malaise
CHANT_SONATA_OF_MALAISE.wearoff: The sonata of malaise stops echoing in your ears.

CHANT_SPIRIT_BEAR.name: spirit of the bear
CHANT_SPIRIT_BEAR.wearoff: Your claws become decidedly less bear-like.

CHANT_SPIRIT_WOLF.name: spirit of the wolf
CHANT_SPIRIT_WOLF.wearoff: Your fangs recede and you lose your wolf-like spirit.

CHANT_WAR_CRY.name: war cry
CHANT_WAR_CRY.wearoff: Your determination level returns to normal.

SONG_BALLAD_OF_TEARS.name: ballad of tears
SONG_BALLAD_OF_TEARS.wearoff: Your nerves settle down as the terror leaves you.

SONG_SONG_OF_REST.name: song of rest
SONG_SONG_OF_REST.wearoff: The restful song fades from your memory.

SONG_ENRAPTURE.name: enrapture
SONG_ENRAPTURE.wearoff: You regain your senses as the illusions subside.

SONG_FREEDOM_SONG.name: freedom song
SONG_FREEDOM_SONG.wearoff: Your nerves settle down as the terror leaves you.

SONG_TERROR.name: terror
SONG_TERROR.wearoff: Your nerves settle down as the terror leaves you.
